name: Block Wave VR
description: Compete for the high score in this fast paced, addictive virtual reality block puzzler designed for the HTC Vive! Inspired by 1980â€™s Synthwave with an original score, Block Wave will keep you immersed for hours.

recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: VR Only! Built for HTC Vive.
